metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a member of Gur Tribe at Cazador's Palace
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl+Shift+7 (Origin Debug Book)Astarion - Origin Moments - Act 3 Gur Follow UpApproach the Gur Leader, a dialog will be started.After the dialog ends you can click on any individual Gur.

0.speaker: Cassivora Dophir
0.text: I'm just surprised you were able to survive, honestly.

1.speaker: Cassivora Dophir
1.text: If you think those spawn will stay in the Underdark, you're a fool. We'll see them soon, mark my words.

2.speaker: Cassivora Dophir
2.text: I didn't think anyone could beat the Vampire Ascendant. I've never been happier to be wrong.

3.speaker: Cassivora Dophir
3.text: At least the spawn can't do any damage from those cells. Let them rot.

4.speaker: Cassivora Dophir
4.text: I wish I could have seen you do it - killing all those spawn.
